query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, IS_NULLABLE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'google_drive_tokens' ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 385B8cqVvDyKYq8.2ff4d9bc4b3d --database HoXBpYBQ3qbVm6g7qLEzMx --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, IS_NULLABLE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'google_drive_tokens' ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION;
stdout:
COLUMN_NAME	DATA_TYPE	IS_NULLABLE
id	int	NO
user_id	int	NO
access_token	text	NO
refresh_token	text	YES
expiry_date	timestamp	YES
scope	text	YES
token_type	varchar	YES
folder_ids	text	YES
created_at	timestamp	NO
updated_at	timestamp	NO
